content.text: The school complies with the Indonesian Personal Data Protection (PDP) Law to safeguard the privacy of students, parents, and staff. Personal data is collected only for legitimate educational purposes.

content.label: Consent
content.text: Explicit consent is obtained for data collection and for the use of student images in media.

content.title: Retention Periods
rows: Until student turns 21 or 5 years after leaving

items: Access Control: Access to sensitive digital data (EduNav, HR systems) is restricted based on user roles.
Digital Security: Use of strong passwords, encryption, firewalls, and regular backups.
Physical Security: Hard copy records are stored in locked, fire-resistant cabinets in secure offices.

content.text: In the event of a data breach, the Data Protection Officer (DPO) must be notified immediately. The DPO will assess the breach, mitigate damage, and notify affected individuals and authorities as required by law.
